channel.title: Slayer price
channel.description: Ok well I am re-doing my slayer shop and when I was done adding the items the prices were way to high so I went to "prices" but it only gave me the price as if I were to sell it in coins so it was "id of item" and "32m was the amount in coins" but in the slayer shop its 2,500 slayer points and I want it to be lower how can I change that to like 1,000 slayer points?

item.title: Slayer price
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

go to shopassistant.java and type in the item id if the item you want to lower,lets say ur doing armadyl gs which is 11694 so it will say "case 11694:
return 2500;

so the case is your item id and the return value is the amount the item sells for in the shop. there ya go!

Read full topic
